body_html:
We have one environment with the following combination (cuDNN v7.2.1 and CUDA 9.0) with no problem. Is your environment bare metal or container?

cdiep/pytorch@60b1656:$ function lib_installed() { /sbin/ldconfig -N -v $(sed 's/:/ /' <<< $LD_LIBRARY_PATH) 2>/dev/null | grep $1; }
cdiep/pytorch@60b1656:$ function check() { lib_installed $1 && echo "$1 is installed" || echo "ERROR: $1 is NOT installed"; }
cdiep/pytorch@60b1656:$ check libcudnn
libcudnn.so.7 -> libcudnn.so.7.2.1
libcudnn is installed
cdiep/pytorch@60b1656:$ function lib_installed() { /sbin/ldconfig -N -v $(sed 's/:/ /' <<< $LD_LIBRARY_PATH) 2>/dev/null | grep $1; }
cdiep/pytorch@60b1656:$ function check() { lib_installed $1 && echo "$1 is installed" || echo "ERROR: $1 is NOT installed"; }
cdiep/pytorch@60b1656:$ check libcuda
libcudart.so.9.0 -> libcudart.so.9.0.176
libcuda.so.1 -> libcuda.so.390.46
libcuda is installed
cdiep/pytorch@60b1656:~$ check libcudart
libcudart.so.9.0 -> libcudart.so.9.0.176

body:
We have one environment with the following combination (cuDNN v7.2.1 and CUDA 9.0) with no problem.  Is your environment bare metal or container?

cdiep@60b1656e9e2e:~$ function lib_installed() { /sbin/ldconfig -N -v $(sed 's/:/ /' <<< $LD_LIBRARY_PATH) 2>/dev/null | grep $1; }
cdiep@60b1656e9e2e:~$ function check() { lib_installed $1 && echo "$1 is installed" || echo "ERROR: $1 is NOT installed"; }
cdiep@60b1656e9e2e:~$ check libcudnn
        libcudnn.so.7 -> libcudnn.so.7.2.1
libcudnn is installed
cdiep@60b1656e9e2e:~$ function lib_installed() { /sbin/ldconfig -N -v $(sed 's/:/ /' <<< $LD_LIBRARY_PATH) 2>/dev/null | grep $1; }
cdiep@60b1656e9e2e:~$ function check() { lib_installed $1 && echo "$1 is installed" || echo "ERROR: $1 is NOT installed"; }
cdiep@60b1656e9e2e:~$ check libcuda
        libcudart.so.9.0 -> libcudart.so.9.0.176
        libcuda.so.1 -> libcuda.so.390.46
libcuda is installed
cdiep@60b1656e9e2e:~$ check libcudart
        libcudart.so.9.0 -> libcudart.so.9.0.176
